title: Google Pixel 5 - Just received and screen is yellow tint.
content:
Just received google pixel 5, compared with my old BQ Aquaris, the screen is so white.
i mean, white is not white is a litter bit yellow.
All the settings are touched but still with some yellow tint.

Also read previous post, but my doubt is, if it is done on purpose or it is an issue in my mobile.

as not too much people reported, seems like a screen bug.

already talked with the sales shop but they do not know if it is a normal colour or not.

So, please resolve my doubt.

Regards.
